pages.title: Reticulated Python
pages.text: The reticulated python ($(o)Malayopython reticulatus$()) is a python species native to South and Southeast Asia.$(br2)It is the world's longest snake, and listed as least concern on the IUCN Red List because of its wide distribution.$(br2)It is among the three heaviest snakes.

pages.title: Reticulated Python
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:porkchop$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
